12,"WN272","Community","Open Cage Data, the blog of [Open Cage Geocoder](http://geocoder.opencagedata.com/) published [an interview](http://blog.opencagedata.com/post/130473733143/open-geo-interview-osm- buildings) with [Jan Marsch](https://twitter.com/kekscom), the mind and developer of OSM Buildings [OSM Buildings](http://osmbuildings.org/?lat=52.52111&lon=13.40988&zoom=16)."

88,"WN273","Maps","It [looks like](http://www.openstreetmap.org/user/stk_ulm/history#map=18/48.42282/9.95528&layers=D), as if the face lift at [OSM Buildings](http://osmbuildings.org/?lat=48.42252&lon=9.95543&zoom=18.0&tilt=30) inspires to [3D mapping](https: //twitter.com/UlmAPI/status/653643644784787456) . ;-)"

584,"WN280","Software","[OSMBuildings](http://osmbuildings.org/)  includes a new option to print on a region of a map via 3YOURMIND directly in 3D. (via [@OSMBuildings](https://twitter.com/OSMBuildings/status/669205396461068289))"

1524,"WN297","Maps","Moritz [explains](http://blog.webkid.io/3d-maps-with-osmbuildings) how he creates great interactive maps with OSMBuildings, e.g. the one of [Berlin](http://interaktiv.morgenpost.de/berlins-neue-skyline)."

7087,"WN412","Programming","OSM Buildings [published](https://osmbuildings.org/blog/2018-06-06_about_privacy/) their privacy policy and a few updates on how to use their services."
9604,"WN464","Did you know that …","... a few lines of code with the 3-D Tool [3D OSM Buildings](https://codepen.io/osmbuildings/pen/oVVXEm) lets us rotate a panoramic view."

11995,"WN516","OpenStreetMap Foundation","Michael Reichert [thinks](https://lists.openstreetmap.org/pipermail/osmf-talk/2020-June/006864.html) that the OSMF shouldn't grant rights for using its name in a particular manner, here 'OSM Buildings', as he wants to protect the business of [3DBuildings](https://3dbuildings.com/), which has existed since 2013, following the application of Cesium to use the name 'Cesium OSM Buildings'. The difference between 3DBuildings, which already runs a website called [osmbuildings.org](http://osmbuildings.org), and Cesium is that [the latter asked](https://lists.openstreetmap.org/pipermail/osmf-talk/2020-June/006889.html) the OSMF to use the name and that the viewer of 3DBuildings is available on [GitHub](https://github.com/OSMBuildings/OSMBuildings/) ."

12486,"WN526","OpenStreetMap Foundation","[OSM Buildings](https://osmbuildings.org/).org [tweeted](https://twitter.com/OSMBuildings/status/1295393233766428672) that the number of its users confused by '[Cesium OSM Buildings](https://cesium.com/blog/2020/06/01/cesium-osm-buildings/)' is rising and complains that the OSMF has not responded to their concerns."

12534,"WN527","OpenStreetMap Foundation","[OSM Buildings](https://osmbuildings.org/) has existed since 2012. [Cesium](https://cesium.com/index.html) has applied for the right to use the name 'Cesium OSM Buildings' and [has been](https://wiki.osmfoundation.org/wiki/Board/Minutes/2020-06#2020.2FRes29_Grant_Cesium_permission_to_use_our_trademark_in_their_product_.E2.80.9CCesium_OSM_Buildings.E2.80.9C) approved by the OSMF Board. According to the project OSM Buildings had expressed concerns and asked for the opportunity to clarify the situation. OSMF and Cesium [published](https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/08/17/osmf-and-cesium-joint-press-release-openstreetmap-a-map-of-buildings/) on the product 'Cesium OSM Buildings' (we [covered](https://weeklyosm.eu/archives/13572#wn526_23183) earlier). It was also announced that Cesium is now a silver sponsor of OSMF. OSM Buildings now [fears](https://osmbuildings.org/blog/2020-08-24_cesium_osm_buildings/) that the use of the project name by Cesium will affect the continued existence of the project."
